relation: Great for these types of students
Adults returning to school Anyone wanting to earn a degree in nursing.
I can't say enough about the affordability of this school.
BCC has one of the best football teams in the country. Football games are always fun.
Do your FAFSA to make the financial aid process easier. Make an appointment to see an adviser, so you can take your time making decisions.
BCC has affordable tuition. BCC is great for nontraditional students. BCC has terrific choices for degrees.

textAfterTable: Categories Comments Bang for the buck definately worth it Am enjoying being here the environment was very nice Am learning a lot i learned exactly what i needed Login to rate or flag the reviews Stewart from Rose Hill, KS 10/26/2010 Reviewer is A current student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 3 of 34 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Just get involved and dont be afraid to make friends.
